example: Remove the [MPSC]{REG} from the [splenic vein]{REG} and the [IVC graft]{REG} on the [IHIVC]{REG}
Transfer the [solution]{REG} with {pasteur pipette}[Device] into the [vials]{Container}
Measure the [37 °C]{Temperature} of the solution before adding any reagents.
Add [3 mL]{Volume} of distilled water to the mixture and stir thoroughly.
Determine the [2%]{Concentration} concentration of the sample using a spectrophotometer.
Weigh the sample using a balance and record the [0.05 g]{Mass} mass.
Measure the [250 nm]{Length} length of the DNA strand using a UV-VIS spectrophotometer.
Apply a [50 mN]{Force} force to the object and observe its displacement.
